My room was clean and the cleaning ladies were very pleasant and helpful – even helped me carry bags when I was coming and leaving

Well the shuttle service had limited hours of operation the free drinks were in small cups filled with ice and juice club access was for a local spot where entrance was free and the daily breakfast consisted of a loaf of bread a bag of bagels jar of jelly tub of butter juice and a toaster
I encourage you to spend the extra money for peace of mind clean towels and a clean room
did not end up spending a lot of time in the room except for sleeping modest but clean and comfortable room on a budget with excellent location

so anyway if you wana live with bugs inside the room then book this hotel
